content.raw:
Thanks, I was able to disable clicking on the inertia visual like that,  but I don't think it is possible to not show the bounding box around the visualization.

![inertia.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/4015586488-inertia.png)


Since we add the visualization to the object, so the `showBoundingbox` considers the `visualization` part of the object.

Well we can disable the `showBoundingbox` if there is a visualization being visualized, would that be ok?
content.html:
Thanks, I was able to disable clicking on the inertia visual like that, but I don't think it is possible to not show the bounding box around the visualization.

Since we add the visualization to the object, so the showBoundingbox considers the visualization part of the object.

Well we can disable the showBoundingbox if there is a visualization being visualized, would that be ok?
